text: This is the list of those writers who wrote short stories in Urdu Language. == List == * Syed Sajjad Haider Yaldram * Hamid Ullah Afsar * Sultan Hyder Josh * Premchand * Ansar Ahmad Azam Krivi Death 1955 * Pandit Badrinath Sudarshan * Ali Abbas Hussaini * Jaleel Qidwai * Sadiq Al-Khairi Death 1989 * Mansoor Ahmad Writer * Fazl e Haq Qureshi * Saadat Hasan Manto * Ahmad Nadeem Qasmi * Krishan Chander * Khwaja Ahmad Abbas * Mumtaz Mufti * Intizar Hussain * Naiyer Masud * Asad Muhammad Khan * Mustansar Hussain Tarar * Enver Sajjad * Balraj Menra * Surendra Prakash * Upendranath Ashk * Abdullah Hussain (writer) * Mirza Adeeb * Muhammad Mansha Yaad * Mohammad Hameed Shahid * Ghulam-us- Saqlain_Naqvi * Muhammad Asim Butt * Ismat Chughtai * Zia Fatehabadi * Niaz Fatehpuri * Ashfaq Ahmed * Majnun Gorakhpuri * Gulzar * Akhtar Husain * Ali Sardar Jafri --> * Ghulam-us-Saqlain Naqvi * Rahman Abbas * Anwar Shemza * Shaukat Thanvi * Syed Muhammad Ashraf * Salam Bin Razzaq * Anis Nagi * Bano Qudsia * Razia Butt * Qurratulain Hyder * Hajira Masroor * Zahida Hina * Khadija Mastoor * Rashid Jahan * Altaf Fatima == References == Category:Urdu short story writers *
title: List of Urdu short story writers
